sentences.sContent: He was condemned to life imprisonment.

words.tran: 该受责备的，应受谴责的；该罚的；应定罪的，该定罪的
谴责；定罪；非难的理由；征用

remMethod.val: con(表加强) ＋ dem(民众) ＋ n → 受民众强烈谴责 → 谴责

trans.tranCn: 迫使（某人）陷于不幸的境地
trans.tranOther: if a particular situation condemns someone to something, it forces them to live in an unpleasant way or to do something unpleasant
